Involved Terms: Tamily Tanderveil->塔米莉·坦德威尔 | Otari Fishery->奥塔里渔场 | Otari Fishery->奥塔里渔场 | Otari Fishery->奥塔里渔场 | background->背景 | adventure->冒险 | character->角色 | ancestry->族裔 | Absalom->艾巴萨罗姆 | player->玩家 | player->玩家 | armor->护甲 | class->职业 | class->职业 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | area->区域 | area->区域 | area->区域 | gear->道具 | time->时代
Original:
Once each player has chosen their hero and everyone is ready to play, it’s time to begin the game. Make sure that the tokens for each hero are placed by the stairway at the bottom of floor 1, next to @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{Area 01}.

Once everyone is ready to begin, start by reading the text in green below to set the scene.

The small seaside town of Otari is known for its fresh fish and skilled sailors, but above all, it’s a big logging town, providing valuable wood to the nearby metropolis of Absalom. But for you, Otari is home. You grew up playing on the docks, getting lost in the nearby woods, and hearing the fantastical stories of travelers from faraway lands, tales of terrifying dragons and virtuous knights. Such adventure always seemed so distant- until today.
Word has begun to spread around Otari that there's a problem down at the Otari Fishery. Some are saying that some sort of beast is lurking in the basement, feeding on the stores of salted fish. Folks are worried that whatever is eating the fish might get hungry enough to eat the fishers next!
You've received a letter from Tamily Tanderveil, the owner of the Fishery. Inside is a desperate plea for help. With the town guard busy protecting the loggers, she needs a few brave souls to venture down into the basement of her warehouse and put an end to the beast that's feasting on her fish! Do you have the courage to face the menace under Otari?

Sharing Artwork

 Knowledge Base: Journal Entries

As you read the above text, you might want to show your players a picture of Tamily so they can see who’s asking them to take on this task.

Thankfully, that's very easy! Each major location and NPC in Otari has a dedicated handout describing their place of business and personality. As well as advice on how to portray Tamily, the @UUID[JournalEntry.sgxbTVNpwJ0jWBvw.JournalEntryPage.YscCX6Wrt1ZTiyhk]{Otari Fishery} handout includes a link to a picture of her.

To show a journal image to your players, you need only open it and click on "Show Players" in the header. This works whether the artwork is a dedicated page or is embedded in a text page. For instance, if you'd like to show them the vignette that's embedded in the Otari Fishery journal, you can click on it and then click "Show Players" in the exact same way. 

After you finish reading, have the players introduce their heroes to one another, including their name, ancestry, background, and class. Players might also want to describe what their hero looks like, what kind of gear they carry, and maybe a bit about their personality.

After the introductions, make sure the player tokens are on the stairs leading down into the basement in Area 1. The order is up to them to decide, but it's smart to put characters with more Hit Points or a higher Armor Class in front. Make sure that one character is at the bottom of the stairs, then activate the scene and move on to the journal entry for @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{Area 01}.
Translation:
当每位玩家都选好了他们的英雄，且大家都准备好开始时，就是时刻开始游戏了。确保每位英雄的指示物都放置在1层底部的楼梯旁，紧邻@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{区域 01}。

一旦大家都准备好开始，请先阅读下面绿色的文字来交代背景。

海滨小镇奥塔里以其鲜鱼和熟练的水手而闻名，但最重要的是，它是一个大型的伐木城镇，为附近的都会艾巴萨罗姆提供宝贵的木材。但对你来说，奥塔里就是家。你从小在码头上玩耍，在附近的森林里迷路，听着来自远方国度旅行者的奇幻故事，那些关于恐怖巨龙和高尚骑士的传说。这样的冒险似乎总是那么遥远——直到今天。
消息开始在奥塔里传开，说奥塔里渔场那里出了问题。有人说某种野兽正潜伏在地下室里，以储存的咸鱼为食。人们担心，无论那是在吃鱼的什么东西，一旦饿极了，接下来可能就会吃掉渔民！
你收到了渔场主塔米莉·坦德威尔的一封信。信中是绝望的求助。由于城镇卫兵正忙于保护伐木工，她需要一些勇敢的人冒险进入她仓库的地下室，除掉那只正在大啖她的鱼的野兽！你有勇气面对奥塔里地下的威胁吗？

分享原画

 知识库：日志条目

当你阅读上述文字时，你可能想向你的玩家展示一张塔米莉的照片，这样他们就能看到是谁在请求他们承担这项任务。

幸好，这非常简单！奥塔里的每个主要地点和NPC都有专门的讲义，描述他们的营业场所和个性。除了关于如何扮演塔米莉的建议外，@UUID[JournalEntry.sgxbTVNpwJ0jWBvw.JournalEntryPage.YscCX6Wrt1ZTiyhk]{奥塔里渔场}讲义还包含一个指向她照片的链接。

要向你的玩家展示日志图像，你只需打开它并点击页眉中的“展示给玩家”。无论原画是专门的页面还是嵌入在文本页面中，这都有效。例如，如果你想向他们展示嵌入在奥塔里渔场日志中的插图，你可以点击它，然后以完全相同的方式点击“展示给玩家”。 

读完之后，让玩家互相介绍他们的英雄，包括他们的名字、族裔、背景和职业。玩家可能还想描述他们的英雄长什么样，携带什么样的装备，以及一点关于他们的性格。

介绍完毕后，确保玩家指示物位于通往区域 1地下室的楼梯上。顺序由他们决定，但将具有更多生命值或更高护甲等级的角色放在前面是明智的。确保一名角色位于楼梯底部，然后激活场景并转到@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{区域 01}的日志条目。

Involved Terms: Pathfinder Beginner Box->Pathfinder新手包 | Pathfinder Beginner Box->Pathfinder新手包 | Pirate King's Plunder->海贼王的财宝 | Menace Under Otari->奥塔里地下的威胁 | Menace Under Otari->奥塔里地下的威胁 | Creating Your Hero->创建你的角色 | Introduction->介绍 | roleplaying->角色扮演 | roleplaying->角色扮演 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险
Original:
Take the first step into an amazing world of fantasy adventure! The Pathfinder Beginner Box contains everything you need to learn how to play the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game, including rules to create your own fantasy hero and tools to make your own amazing stories.

Welcome to the Pathfinder Beginner Box! This module has been constructed from the ground up to provide you with a simple but detailed introduction to the Pathfinder Second Edition game system, as well as how to make the most out of its features in Foundry Virtual Tabletop. As you progress through the Menace Under Otari adventure, the Journal Entries you read will provide you with instructions on everything from game rules to software usage.

Where to start?

Most of the contents of this module are heavily interlinked, which means that you don't need to worry too much about reading something out of order. If something is relevant, we'll try to link to it, so you should always only be a click away from context at any point. However, it can be daunting to just dive in, so here are some recommended starting points!

  • If you're new to Foundry, then some of the tabs on the left hand side will explain how to use the various types of content included in this adventure.

  • If you'd like to learn more about the rules of the Pathfinder Second Edition system, then the @UUID[JournalEntry.OoPjlnYYGLn5KPZy.JournalEntryPage.pgOC3zCWvUFGiuTj]{What's a Roleplaying Game?} journal exists to walk you through the key concepts and ideas.

  • If you'd like to dive right in to the Menace Under Otari adventure, then all you need to do is gather up some players and consult the @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UP1WB6tI0SFgMMzC]{Introduction} to see how to get started. Make sure to share the @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8]{Creating Your Hero} journal with your players, as well!

  • If you don't have a group yet, the solo adventure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-beginner-box.adventures.5KQWZpnK28WGytlL]{Pirate King's Plunder} can be a great introduction to ease you into the action.

Folders and Organisation

While most of this module was designed to be read by the Gamemaster, there is still plenty of useful information and instruction in this module for players! The folders in each tab have been color-coded to indicate who can see their contents. If the folder has a red hue it is visible to all players. If the folder has no color assigned, it contains reference material only (such as credits or legal information). If the folder is green, it contains information that is visible to GMs only.
Translation:
踏入奇幻冒险的精彩世界！《Pathfinder新手包》包含了学习如何游玩Pathfinder角色扮演游戏所需的一切，包括创建你自己的奇幻英雄的规则，以及谱写你自己的精彩故事的工具。

欢迎来到《Pathfinder新手包》！本模组从零开始构建，旨在为你提供对Pathfinder第二版游戏系统简单而详尽的介绍，以及如何在Foundry虚拟桌面中充分利用其功能。随着你在《奥塔里地下的威胁》冒险中不断推进，你所阅读的日志条目将为你提供从游戏规则到软件使用的全方位指导。

从何处开始？

本模组的大部分内容都紧密关联，这意味着你无需过多担心阅读顺序。如果某些内容相关，我们会尝试提供链接，因此你随时只需点击一下即可获取上下文。然而，直接投身其中可能会让人望而生畏，所以这里有一些推荐的起点！

  • 如果你是Foundry的新手，左侧的一些标签页将解释如何使用本冒险中包含的各类内容。

  • 如果你想了解更多关于Pathfinder第二版系统规则的信息，那么 @UUID[JournalEntry.OoPjlnYYGLn5KPZy.JournalEntryPage.pgOC3zCWvUFGiuTj]{什么是角色扮演游戏？} 日志将引导你了解关键概念和思路。

  • 如果你想直接投身于《奥塔里地下的威胁》冒险，那么你只需要召集一些玩家并查阅 @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UP1WB6tI0SFgMMzC]{介绍} 来了解如何开始。同时也请务必与你的玩家分享 @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8]{创建你的角色} 日志！

  • 如果你还没有团队，单人冒险 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-beginner-box.adventures.5KQWZpnK28WGytlL]{海贼王的财宝} 可以作为一个很好的入门，让你轻松进入状态。

文件夹与组织

虽然本模组的大部分内容是为游戏主持人设计的，但其中仍有大量对玩家有用的信息和指导！每个标签页中的文件夹都经过了颜色编码，以指示谁可以看到其内容。如果文件夹呈红色调，则所有玩家都可见。如果文件夹没有分配颜色，则它仅包含参考资料（如制作人员名单或法律信息）。如果文件夹是绿色的，则它包含仅GM可见的信息。

Involved Terms: Menace Under Otari->奥塔里地下的威胁 | Lardus Longsaddle->拉杜斯·长鞍 | Isle of Kortos->寇托斯岛 | Wrin Sivinxi->瓦林·希温尼斯 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | creature->生物 | setting->设定 | armor->护甲 | level->等级 | ghost->幽灵（特征） | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | time->时代
Original:
Using Otari in your campaign

@UUID[JournalEntry.sgxbTVNpwJ0jWBvw]{Otari Locations}

The Otari scene included with this world can serve as a map of the town.

More information on the town's key locations is included in the pinned journals. Together with a list of NPCs and plot hooks, GMs that would like to set an adventure in Otari should find they have all the tools they need. Of course, Otari also serves as an excellent springboard for adventures that take place outside of town, with the entire Isle of Kortos on your doorstep!

As well as being the setting of the @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2]{Menace Under Otari} adventure, the town of Otari is also a central location in the acclaimed Abomination Vaults adventure path.

Story Seeds

The heroes might end up spending some time in Otari, and adventures can happen in town just as easily as in a dungeon or the wilderness. Here are possible encounters and seeds for larger stories.

A Bad Day at the Market

Laborers laying the foundation for an expansion to the Otari Market unearth a nest of giant centipedes that spill into the market stalls and must be exterminated. The centipedes' lair connects to a disused sewer system, where a group of goblins are planning a sneaky raid on the market. If the heroes act quickly, they can catch the goblin thieves by surprise.

The Fire God

An arsonist captured by the Otari Guard insists that her crimes were commanded by a divine being she met in the ruins of a building that had burned down year earlier. The building contains a hell hound, cinder rats, and a creature of shimmering fire who claims to be a god. This “god” is the malevolent ghost of an actor who died in the earlier fire and hopes to deceive the living.

Grim Harvest

Two acolytes from the Dawnflower Library are acting suspiciously, opening the graves in the Otari Graveyard they’re supposed to be tending. Investigation shows the acolytes have been murdered and replaced by doppelgangers. They’ve been exhuming the graves to feed a gluttonous band of ghouls, who lair within a mausoleum the doppelgangers have filled with traps and other dangers. If the heroes defeat the ghouls, they recover a strange idol the ghouls used to command the doppelgangers; the heroes can then use the idol to discover who else in town has been replaced.

Honor of Thieves

At Crook’s Nook, a brine shark elemental leaps right into the tavern from one of the trapdoors. The heroes are on hand to defeat it, earning the gratitude of the Osprey Club. The thieves decide to thank the heroes by committing minor crimes against the heroes’ rivals (or anyone they perceive to be the heroes’ rivals) and give the heroes the “credit.” These gestures undoubtedly land the heroes in trouble with Lardus Longsaddle, and the heroes must clear up the confusion.

Under the Thirsty Alpaca

The Thirsty Alpaca’s collapse was inadvertently caused by a tribe of kobolds digging out tunnels beneath it while seeking treasures they believed were still hidden there. Their biggest mistake was allying with a gang of pugwampi gremlins, whose ill luck caused the collapse. The surviving kobolds try to keep townspeople away from the ruins with their spooky tricks and traps. The kobolds seek to re-excavate the passages and also fight against the surviving gremlins, who have decided to betray them! The PCs could try to negotiate a truce, evict both the kobolds and the gremlins, or find another solution.

Wrin's Surprise Gift

While meeting with the heroes, Wrin Sivinxi receives a large, unlabeled package. She opens it to reveal animated armor that runs amok. After the heroes stop it, Wrin asks them to track down the person who shipped it. Their investigation leads to a ship at the harbor, where an old enemy of Wrin’s is hiding out with her hobgoblin warrior bodyguards.

More Adventures in Otari

The adventure in this book and the story seeds above aren’t the only adventures this town offers. The standalone Pathfinder Adventure Troubles in Otari continues the story begun here and brings heroes all the way to 5th level. The Abomination Vaults Adventure Path is a separate series of three linked adventures, starting with Ruins of Gauntlight, set in Otari and a dangerous dungeon just to the north. Of course, you can also invent adventures of your own!
Translation:
在你的战役中使用奥塔里

@UUID[JournalEntry.sgxbTVNpwJ0jWBvw]{奥塔里地点}

本世界包含的奥塔里场景可以作为该城镇的地图。

有关城镇关键地点的更多信息包含在置顶日志中。配合NPC列表和剧情钩子，想要在奥塔里开展冒险的GM应该会发现他们拥有所需的一切工具。当然，奥塔里也是镇外冒险的绝佳跳板，整个寇托斯岛就在你的家门口！

除了作为@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2]{奥塔里地下的威胁}冒险的设定外，奥塔里镇也是广受好评的“邪恶金库（Abomination Vaults）”冒险径路的核心地点。

故事种子

英雄们可能会在奥塔里度过一些时代，城镇里的冒险可以像在地城或荒野中一样轻松发生。以下是可能的遭遇和更宏大故事的种子。

集市糟糕的一天

为奥塔里集市扩建奠定基础的劳工挖掘出了一个巨型蜈蚣巢穴，它们涌入集市摊位，必须被消灭。蜈蚣的巢穴连接着一个废弃的下水道系统，一群地精正计划对集市进行偷袭。如果英雄们行动迅速，他们可以打地精小偷一个措手不及。

火神

一名被奥塔里卫队抓获的纵火犯坚称，她的罪行是受一个神圣存在的指使，她在多年前被烧毁的一座建筑废墟中遇到了这个存在。这座建筑里有一只地狱犬、几只灰烬鼠，以及一个自称为神的闪烁火焰生物。这个“神”其实是一个在早先火灾中丧生的演员的邪恶幽灵（特征），他希望能欺骗生者。

冷酷收割

来自晨花图书馆的两名助祭行为可疑，他们打开了本应由其看守的奥塔里墓地中的坟墓。调查显示，这些助祭已被谋杀，并被变形怪取代。他们一直在挖掘坟墓，以喂养一群贪婪的食尸鬼，这些食尸鬼潜伏在变形怪布满陷阱和其他危险的陵墓中。如果英雄们击败了食尸鬼，他们会找回一个食尸鬼用来指挥变形怪的奇怪神像；英雄们随后可以使用该神像来发现镇上还有谁被取代了。

盗贼的荣誉

在弯钩客栈（Crook’s Nook），一个盐水鲨元素从一个活板门直接跳进了酒馆。英雄们正好在场并击败了它，赢得了鱼鹰俱乐部（Osprey Club）的感激。盗贼们决定通过对英雄的竞争对手（或任何他们认为是英雄竞争对手的人）实施轻微犯罪并将“功劳”归于英雄来感谢他们。这些举动无疑会让英雄们陷入与拉杜斯·长鞍的麻烦中，英雄们必须澄清误会。

在口渴的羊驼之下

“口渴的羊驼”旅店的倒塌是由一群狗头人无意中造成的，他们在旅店下方挖掘隧道，寻找他们认为仍隐藏在那里的宝藏。他们最大的错误是与一群帕格瓦姆皮小魔鬼结盟，后者的厄运导致了坍塌。幸存的狗头人试图用他们诡异的把戏和陷阱让镇民远离废墟。狗头人寻求重新挖掘通道，并与决定背叛他们的幸存小魔鬼作战！PC可以尝试协商停战，驱逐狗头人和小魔鬼，或者寻找其他解决方案。

瓦林的惊喜礼物

在与英雄们会面时，瓦林·希温尼斯收到一个没有标签的大包裹。她打开包裹，发现里面是一套失控的活化护甲。在英雄们制止它之后，瓦林请他们追踪寄件人。他们的调查指向港口的一艘船，瓦林的一个老敌人正带着她的大地精战士保镖躲在那里。

更多在奥塔里的冒险

本书中的冒险和上述故事种子并不是这个城镇提供的唯一冒险。独立的探路者冒险《奥塔里纠纷》延续了这里开始的故事，并将英雄一直带到第5等级。“邪恶金库（Abomination Vaults）”冒险径路是一个由三个相关联的冒险组成的独立系列，从《高特莱特废墟》（Ruins of Gauntlight）开始，背景设定在奥塔里和北边一个危险的地城。当然，你也可以发明自己的冒险！

Original:
This chamber houses the majority of the kobold band dwelling here. When the heroes enter the room, read the following aloud.

As the door opens, the smell of rotten fish and mold wafts out. On the west side of this vast room is a large table with benches on either side. Old food scraps, dirty knives, and broken plates cover the table. Off to the east side, burrows have been dug into the wall to make small sleeping chambers filled with straw mats. This must be the kobolds' warren!

Kobold Placement

The kobolds beneath Otari have claimed this chamber as their home. Six of them are here, but their exact location depends on the heroes’ actions in other areas. If the heroes made lots of noise breaking through the wall between this area and the @UUID[.CMjhAWaRWlbFVoF0]{Xulgath den} or by destroying the mechanisms for the mermaid fountain trap in @UUID[.MSU45JsvJjOJc1dg]{Area 16}, place all six of the kobolds in the center of the room, ready to attack. If the heroes were quiet, the kobolds are relaxing when the heroes enter. Place three of them at the table, and put the other three in the sleeping alcoves.

Wherever the kobolds are, they're not happy about having visitors. They spring to attack! Ask each player to roll initiative, and roll Perception once to determine when the kobolds get their turn.

The kobolds don’t focus on any one character. Pairs of kobolds might try to flank one hero to use their sneak attack, while others use the unconventional tactics described below.

While fighting the heroes, the kobolds boast of their mighty lineage and combined power, assuring the “soft-skin” heroes that they’ll surely come to regret trespassing into the kobolds’ domain. However, they remain just as cowardly as the kobolds the heroes have already defeated in these caverns.

Unlike all the foes the heroes have faced so far, the last remaining kobold tries to surrender.

Encounter

@Actor[r9w1n85mp9Ip4QiS]{6 Kobold Warriors}

Unconventional Tactics

These kobolds use tactics in their fight, such as attempting to flank the heroes whenever possible. Since this is their home, they have a few other tricks they can use against the heroes. Use these throughout the fight to add variety and keep the players on their toes!

  • Bed Cover: A kobold in one of the sleeping chambers can spend 1 action to pull a sleeping mat off the floor and hide behind it. Doing so grants the kobold @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Effect: Cover} until they move or the start of their next turn.
  • Food Fight: A kobold adjacent to the table can spend 1 action to pick up a scrap of rotting meat and throw it at a hero within 20 feet. This is a ranged Strike with a +5 attack modifier. If the Strike hits, it doesn’t deal damage. Instead, the hero is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} until they spend an action to clean the gross food off (no check needed).

  • Oil Attack: The chest between two of the sleeping alcoves contains, among other things, three jars of slippery oil. A kobold must spend an action to open the chest before they can use the oil stored inside. Once the chest is open, a kobold next to it can spend 1 action to pick up and throw one of these jars of oil. This is a ranged Strike with a +5 attack modifier. If it hits a hero, that hero and the square they’re in are coated in slippery oil. On a miss, the oil covers the ground but not the hero. The kobold can also throw the oil at an empty square to make just the square slippery.
    For the rest of the fight, a hero covered in oil has trouble moving. Each time they Stride, they must attempt a @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:10]{Acrobatics Skill Check}. If they fail, they fall over and gain the prone condition instead of moving. The hero can Step, moving only 5 feet, without this check.
    Anyone who moves through a square covered in oil must attempt a @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:10]{Acrobatics Skill Check}. If they fail, they stop moving and fall.

Experience Points

For overcoming the kobolds in this room, award each hero 120 XP. Note that the heroes can earn additional XP depending on how they handle the last remaining kobold.

Kobold Surrender

When only one kobold remains, he immediately drops his weapons and surrenders to the heroes, begging and groveling for his life with a raspy, high-pitched voice. If the heroes spare the kobold, the creature promises to leave and never return, but he also quietly adds that he's willing to share secrets in exchange for gold.

The heroes have two options if they want to learn what the kobold knows. The first is to offer the kobold the gold he requests. If they give the kobold 10 gp, he shares what he knows about the boss, and if they give him 20 gp (total, not in addition), he also shares what he knows about the dragon.

But parting with their hard-earned wealth isn't the only solution. A hero can try to persuade the kobold to share what he knows by rolling a @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:10]{Diplomacy} skill check, or they can bully the kobold with an @Check[type:intimidation|dc:10]{Intimidation} skill check. If a hero's total is 10 or more, they learn about the boss, and if their total is 20 or more, they learn about the dragon, too.

About the Boss: The kobold says the following about their warren's boss.

"Boss Zolgran is the big leader of the mighty kobolds, and she has powerful magics to roast you alive! She's very angry all the time and demands much from her servants. Especially now that we have a powerful new friend!"

About the Dragon: The kobold says the following about the dragon.

"The friend is a dragon and a blessing from the gods, a sign that kobolds are destined to return to the surface and conquer the pathetic human town. As soon as the hatchling is all grown, we'll rise up to take what is ours!"

Experience Points

If the heroes get the surrendered kobold to tell them about the boss, award each hero an additional 10 XP. If they get him to tell them about the dragon, increase this bonus to 30 XP instead.

Treasure

@Actor[1S486XWdfcEWYv6T]{Kobold Loot}

Once the fight ends, the heroes can examine the rest of the warren. Each kobold here is wearing a copper-and-eggshell necklace like those found in @UUID[.2KRdW68qNXeJ6JpN]{Kobold Lookouts}.

In addition to the kobolds' gear, there's a chest filled with trinkets and collected valuables. It holds a bolt of fine silk cloth worth 5 gp, a painting of an adventurer on a horse worth 2 gp, a sack filled with 20 sp, a crystal decanter filled with old, sour wine (the decanter is worth 1 gp), 3 jars of oil (minus any the kobolds threw during the fight), a marvelous miniature ladder, and a healing potion.
Translation:
这个房间居住着这里的大部分 狗头人 族群。当英雄们进入房间时，大声朗读以下内容。

门一打开，一股死鱼和霉味便扑面而来。在这个宽敞房间的西侧，有一张大桌子，两边都摆放着长凳。陈旧的食物残渣、肮脏的刀具和破碎的盘子 掩蔽 着桌面。在东侧，墙上挖出了一些洞穴，做成了铺着草席的小型睡眠室。这一定是狗头人的巢穴！

狗头人布置

奥塔里 地下的狗头人将这个房间据为己有。这里有六个狗头人，但它们的确切位置取决于英雄在其他区域的 动作。如果英雄们在破开这个 区域 与 @UUID[.CMjhAWaRWlbFVoF0]{地蜥人（特征） 巢穴} 之间的墙壁时，或者在破坏 @UUID[.MSU45JsvJjOJc1dg]{区域 16} 的美人鱼喷泉陷阱机制时发出了巨大的噪音，请将所有六个狗头人放在房间中央，准备 攻击。如果英雄们保持安静，那么当他们进入时，狗头人们正在休息。将其中三个放在桌子旁，另外三个放在睡眠壁龛里。

无论狗头人在哪里，他们都不欢迎访客。他们立即发起 攻击！请每位 玩家 投掷 先攻，并投掷一次 察觉 来决定狗头人的 回合。

狗头人们不会集中攻击任何一个 角色。成对的狗头人可能会尝试夹击一名英雄以使用他们的偷袭 攻击，而其他人则使用下面描述的非常规战术。

在与英雄战斗时，狗头人们会夸耀自己强大的血统和集体的力量，向“软皮肤”的英雄们保证，他们一定会为擅闯狗头人的领地而感到后悔。然而，他们仍然和英雄们在这些洞穴中已经击败的狗头人一样懦弱。

与英雄们目前为止面对的所有敌人不同，最后剩下的 狗头人 会尝试投降。

遭遇

@Actor[r9w1n85mp9Ip4QiS]{6 狗头人 战士}

非常规战术

这些狗头人在战斗中使用战术，例如尽可能尝试夹击英雄。由于这里是他们的家，他们还有一些可以对付英雄的其他技巧。在整个战斗过程中使用这些技巧来增加多样性，并让玩家保持警惕！

  • 床铺掩护：位于睡眠室之一的 狗头人 可以花费 1 个动作从地板上拉起一张草席并躲在后面。这样做会赋予该 狗头人 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{效果: 掩蔽}，直到他们移动或直到其下一个 回合 开始。
  • 食物大战：靠近桌子的 狗头人 可以花费 1 个动作捡起一块腐烂的肉，扔向 20 英尺内的一名英雄。这是一次远程打击，具有 +5 攻击 调整值。如果打击命中，它不会造成 伤害。相反，该英雄会陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 (Sickened)} 状态，直到他们花费一个动作清理掉恶心的食物（无需 检定）。

  • 油腻攻击：两个睡眠壁龛之间的箱子里装有三罐滑溜溜的油等物品。 狗头人 必须花费一个动作打开箱子，然后才能使用里面储存的油。箱子打开后，旁边的 狗头人 可以花费 1 个动作捡起并扔出一罐油。这是一次远程打击，具有 +5 攻击 调整值。如果命中英雄，该英雄及其所在的方格都会涂满滑油。如果未命中，油会覆盖地面但不会涂在英雄身上。 狗头人 也可以将油扔向空格子，仅使该格子变得滑溜。
    在战斗的 休息 中，被油覆盖的英雄移动困难。每 时代 他们行进（Stride）时，必须尝试一次 @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:10]{特技 技能 检定}。如果失败，他们会摔倒并获得倒地 状态，而不是移动。英雄可以快步（Step），仅移动 5 英尺，而无需进行此 检定。
    任何穿过被油覆盖的方格的人都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:10]{特技 技能 检定}。如果失败，他们会停止移动并摔倒。

经验值

为了战胜这个房间里的狗头人，奖励每位英雄 120 XP。请注意，英雄们可以根据他们如何处理最后剩下的 狗头人 来获得额外的 XP。

狗头人投降

当只剩下一个 狗头人 时，他会立即放下武器向英雄们投降，用沙哑、尖锐的声音乞求饶命。如果英雄们饶了这只 狗头人，这个 生物 承诺会离开且永不回来，但他也会悄悄补充说，他愿意用秘密换取金币。

如果英雄们想了解 狗头人 知道的事情，他们有两个选择。第一种是向 狗头人 提供他要求的金币。如果他们给 狗头人 10 gp，他会分享他所知道的关于老大的信息；如果他们给他 20 gp（总计，而非额外），他还会分享他所知道的关于龙的信息。

但交出辛苦赚来的 财富 并不是唯一的解决办法。英雄可以尝试通过投掷 @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:10]{外交 (Diplomacy)} 技能 检定 来劝说 狗头人 分享他所知道的事情，或者他们可以用 @Check[type:intimidation|dc:10]{威吓 (Intimidation)} 技能 检定 来威逼 狗头人。如果英雄的总值达到 10 或更多，他们就能得知老大的信息；如果总值达到 20 或更多，他们也能得知关于龙的信息。

关于老大： 狗头人 对他们巢穴的老大有如下描述。

“佐尔甘老大是强大狗头人的大领袖，她拥有能把你们活活烤熟的强大魔法！她 时代 总是很生气，对她的仆人要求很高。尤其是现在我们有了一个强大的新朋友！”

关于龙： 狗头人 对那条龙有如下描述。

“那位朋友是一条龙，是来自神灵的祝福，预示着狗头人注定要回到地表，征服那座可怜的人类城镇。只要那只幼龙长大，我们就会起义夺回属于我们的东西！”

经验值

如果英雄们让投降的 狗头人 告诉他们关于老大的信息，奖励每位英雄额外的 10 XP。如果他们让他告诉关于龙的信息，则将此 加值 增加到 30 XP。

宝藏

@Actor[1S486XWdfcEWYv6T]{狗头人宝藏}

战斗结束后，英雄们可以检查巢穴的 休息。这里的每个 狗头人 都戴着铜和蛋壳制成的项链，就像在 @UUID[.2KRdW68qNXeJ6JpN]{还是狗头人和陷阱} 中发现的那些一样。

除了狗头人的 道具，还有一个装满小饰品和收集到的贵重物品的箱子。里面有一匹价值 5 gp 的精美丝绸布料，一幅价值 2 gp 的冒险者骑马画，一个装有 20 sp 的袋子，一个装满陈年酸酒的水晶酒瓶（酒瓶本身价值 1 gp），3 罐油（减去狗头人在战斗中投掷的数量），一个 惊奇模型：梯子，以及一瓶 治疗药水。

Original:
You make an attack roll when you Strike and for some other actions. For most attack rolls, you’ll compare your result against your target’s Armor Class (AC). There are three main types of attack rolls: melee attack rolls, ranged attack rolls, and spell attack rolls. Some skills can be used to make attacks, such as Athletics being used to Grapple someone rather than damage them.

Multiple Attack Penalty

If you attack more than once on your turn, you take a multiple attack penalty. This penalty is -5 for your second attack, and -10 for your third and any subsequent attacks. Some abilities or features, such as a weapon's agile trait, reduce your Multiple Attack Penalty.

Always calculate your multiple attack penalty for the weapon you’re using on that attack. If you attack with a longsword, then a shortsword (which has the agile trait), the attack with the shortsword is at –4, even though your first attack was with a weapon that isn’t agile.

The penalty resets every turn. It also applies only during your turn, so you don’t have to keep track of it if you can perform an Attack of Opportunity or a similar reaction that lets you make a Strike on someone else’s turn.

Range Penalty

Ranged and thrown weapons are less accurate against targets farther away. The weapon’s range increment determines this interval. As long as your target is at or within the listed range increment, also called the first range increment, you take no penalty to the attack roll. Beyond that distance, you take a –2 penalty for each additional increment beyond the first. Both the multiple attack penalty and range penalty can apply to the same attack, giving a big penalty to your second or third attack against someone far away!

Light and Darkness

There are three levels of light: bright light, dim light, and darkness. The game’s rules assume you’re in bright light, so most of the time you don’t have to worry about any special rules. Areas in shadow or lit by weak light sources are in dim light. Creatures and objects in dim light have the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition, meaning any attack or other effect that would target them fails unless the creature trying to target them succeeds at a DC 5 flat check (rolling a 5 or higher on a d20 without adding anything).

A creature with darkvision or low-light vision can see in the dim light and targets creatures in it normally. Areas without any light at all are in darkness. A creature or object in darkness can’t be seen unless the creature looking for it has darkvision. A creature without darkvision or another means of perceiving in darkness is blinded while in darkness, though it might be able to see illuminated areas beyond the darkness. When you’re blinded, all terrain is difficult terrain and you take a –4 status penalty to Perception checks that rely on sight. If you try to attack or affect a target you can’t see due to darkness or for any other reason, you fail unless you succeed at a DC 11 flat check.

Some actions have you select one or more specific targets. You can’t select a target if it’s out of range, if you can’t tell where it is, if it doesn’t match restrictions on who you can target, or if some other ability prevents it from being targeted.

Some effects target an ally. This must be someone on your side, often another hero, but it might be a bystander you’re trying to protect. You aren’t your own ally. If it isn’t clear, the GM decides who counts as an ally or an enemy. An ability that targets a willing creature doesn’t do anything unless the target allows you to affect them. Only you can decide whether your hero is willing, and the GM decides whether an NPC is willing.

Melee attacks can target someone only if they’re adjacent—right next to the attacker on the grid. Being next to them diagonally on the corner of their space is still adjacent. Some abilities, like the Lunge fighter feat or the enlarge spell, let someone reach creatures further away. Large creatures can always reach creatures up to 10 feet away.

Targeting

 Knowledge Base: Player Orientation

Foundry Virtual Tabletop provides a simple approach to indicating which enemy or ally a player or GM may be targeting. You can quickly mark your targets by hovering the mouse over a token and pressing 'T' on your keyboard. To target multiple tokens, a player can hold shift while pressing T. This provides a small colored indicated which matches the color a player has been assigned, and makes it easy to see who's targeting what.

The Pathfinder Second Edition game system also automates a number of options, such as comparing AC to see if your attack should hit, or providing for conditional bonuses such as Sneak Attacks. These automations only function if you have an enemy targeted when you perform your action.

Cover

When you’re behind an obstacle that could block weapons, guard you against explosions, and make you harder to detect, you’re behind cover. Standard cover gives you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, to Reflex saves against area effects, and to Stealth checks to Hide, Sneak, or otherwise avoid detection.

Creatures give lesser cover, which grants a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. A creature with standard cover can attempt to use the Stealth skill to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, but lesser cover isn’t sufficient for using Stealth.

You might simultaneously have cover against one creature and not another. Cover applies only if your path to the target is partially blocked. If a creature is entirely behind a wall or the like, you typically can’t target it at all. The GM decides whether you have cover and whether it’s lesser or standard.

If you and an ally are on opposite sides or corners of an enemy, you’re flanking that enemy. This gives the creature the flat-footed condition (giving it a –2 circumstance penalty to AC) against attacks from anyone flanking it. If you stop flanking the creature, the flat-footed condition ends.

You can flank or help an ally flank only if you meet all three of the following conditions:

• No condition or effect is preventing you from acting or attacking.

• You’re holding melee weapons or able to make a fist attack.

• You’re close enough to reach the enemy with an attack.

Automated Flanking

The Pathfinder Second Edition game system includes automation of flanking and appropriately enables flanking bonuses for cases where they would apply, removing the need to keep track of it yourself.

A simple way of understanding how this automation works is to consider that there are two "teams", Tokens linked to actors that are owned by players, and tokens whose actors are not. By default, all player characters are on one team and all NPCs are on another, but you can change an NPC's alliance by clicking on the "Configure" button in the header of their actor sheet.
Translation:
当你进行挥砍（Strike）以及进行其他一些动作时，你会进行一次攻击检定。对于大多数攻击检定，你会将结果与目标的护甲职业（AC）进行比较。攻击检定主要有三种类型：近战攻击检定、远程攻击检定以及法术攻击检定。某些技能也可以用来进行攻击，例如使用运动技能来擒抱（Grapple）某人，而不是对其造成伤害。

多重攻击减值

如果你在自己的回合内攻击不止一次，你就会受到多重攻击减值。第二次攻击的此减值为 -5，第三次及后续攻击的减值为 -10。某些能力或特征，例如武器的灵巧（agile）特征，可以降低你的多重攻击减值。

始终根据你在该次攻击中使用的武器来计算多重攻击减值。如果你先用长剑攻击，然后用短剑（具有灵巧特征）攻击，那么短剑的攻击减值为 -4，即使你的第一次攻击使用的是非灵巧武器。

该减值在每个回合重置。它也仅在你的回合内适用，因此如果你可以进行借机攻击或类似的反应动作，让你在别人的回合进行挥砍（Strike），则无需记录它。

射程减值

远程和投掷武器对较远目标的准确度较低。武器的射程增量决定了这个间隔。只要你的目标处于列出的射程增量（也称为第一射程增量）之内，你的攻击检定就不会受到减值。超过该距离后，每增加一个增量，你就会受到 -2 的减值。多重攻击减值和射程减值都可以应用于同一次攻击，这会让你对远处目标的第二次或第三次攻击受到巨大的减值！

光照与黑暗

光照分为三个级别：明亮光照、昏暗光照和黑暗。游戏规则假设你处于明亮光照中，因此大多数时代你不需要担心任何特殊规则。阴影区域或由微弱光源照射的区域处于昏暗光照中。处于昏暗光照中的生物和物体具有@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽}状态，这意味着任何试图以它们为目标的攻击或其他效果都会失败，除非试图目标它们的生物成功通过 DC 5 的纯骰检定（在 d20 掷骰中不加任何修正掷出 5 或更高）。

具有黑暗视觉或低光视觉的生物可以在昏暗光照中看清并正常瞄准其中的生物。完全没有光线的区域处于黑暗中。除非寻找它的生物具有黑暗视觉，否则无法看到黑暗中的生物或物体。没有黑暗视觉或其他在黑暗中感知手段的生物在黑暗中处于瞎眼（blinded）状态，尽管它可能能够看到黑暗之外的照明区域。当你处于瞎眼状态时，所有地形均为困难地形，并且你在依赖视觉的察觉检定上受到 -4 状态减值。如果你尝试攻击或影响一个因黑暗或任何其他原因而看不见的目标，除非你成功通过 DC 11 的纯骰检定，否则你会失败。

某些动作要求你选择一个或多个特定目标。如果目标超出射程、如果你无法确定其位置、如果不符合你可以目标的限制，或者如果有其他能力阻止其被选为目标，则你无法选择该目标。

某些效果以盟友为目标。这必须是你方的人员，通常是另一位英雄，但也可能是你试图保护的旁观者。你不是你自己的盟友。如果不明确，GM 将决定谁算作盟友或敌人。以自愿生物为目标的能力不会产生任何效果，除非目标允许你影响他们。只有你能决定你的英雄是否自愿，而 GM 决定 NPC 是否自愿。

近战攻击只有在目标相邻时才能以其为目标——即在网格上紧挨着攻击者。在他们空间的角落对角相邻也算作相邻。某些能力，如战士的刺击（Lunge）专长或变大术（enlarge）法术，可以让某人触及到更远的生物。大型生物总是可以触及到最远 10 英尺外的生物。

目标选择

 知识库：玩家导向

Foundry 虚拟桌面提供了一种简单的方法来指示玩家或 GM 可能瞄准的敌人或盟友。你可以通过将鼠标悬停在 Token 上并按下键盘上的'T'来快速标记你的目标。要目标多个 Token，玩家可以在按 T 的同时按住shift。这会提供一个与玩家分配的颜色相匹配的小彩色指示，从而可以轻松查看谁在瞄准什么。

Pathfinder 第二版游戏系统还自动执行了许多选项，例如比较 AC 以查看你的攻击是否命中，或提供条件加值（如偷袭攻击）。只有当你执行动作时已经选择了敌人作为目标，这些自动化功能才会生效。

掩蔽

当你处于可以阻挡武器、保护你免受爆炸影响并让你更难被发现的障碍物后面时，你就处于掩蔽之后。标准掩蔽为你的 AC、针对区域效果的反射豁免以及用于躲藏（Hide）、潜行（Sneak）或以其他方式避免被发现的隐秘检定提供 +2 环境加值。

生物提供次级掩蔽，这会为 AC 提供 +1 环境加值。具有标准掩蔽的生物可以尝试使用隐秘技能来@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏}，但次级掩蔽不足以使用隐秘。

你可能同时对一个生物拥有掩蔽而对另一个生物没有。掩蔽仅在通往目标的路径被部分阻挡时才适用。如果一个生物完全在墙壁或类似物体后面，你通常根本无法以它为目标。GM 决定你是否拥有掩蔽以及它是次级还是标准。

如果你和一名盟友位于敌人的相对两侧或角落，你就在夹击该敌人。这会使该生物在面对任何夹击它的攻击时获得措手不及（flat-footed）状态（使其 AC 受到 -2 环境减值）。如果你停止夹击该生物，措手不及状态就会结束。

只有满足以下所有三个条件，你才能进行夹击或帮助盟友夹击：

• 没有状态或效果阻止你行动或攻击。

• 你手持近战武器或能够进行徒手攻击。

• 你的距离足够近，可以用攻击触及到敌人。

自动化夹击

Pathfinder 第二版游戏系统包含夹击的自动化，并在适用情况下适当地启用夹击加值，从而无需你自己进行记录。

理解这种自动化工作原理的一种简单方法是考虑有两个“团队”：链接到玩家拥有的角色的 Token，以及链接到非玩家拥有的角色的 Token。默认情况下，所有玩家角色都在一个团队中，所有 NPC 都在另一个团队中，但你可以通过点击其角色表标题中的“配置（Configure）”按钮来更改其联盟。

Original:
Fishery and shipyard by day, gathering place for games and entertainment by night.

Gathering Places

Every night, from an hour before sundown to an hour before midnight, @UUID[JournalEntry.mbia2YRWQeDkcOou.JournalEntryPage.jETVN9h0a5MupyxS]{Tamily Tanderveil} opens the ground floor of the town’s main fishery to sailors, laborers, and travelers alike, offering a comfortable and welcoming place to gather for games and entertainment. A small menu is offered for those who wish to have drinks or snacks while gaming here, the proceeds of which Tamily frequently gives back in the form of contests and prize money for various impromptu gaming tournaments.
Translation:
白天是渔场和造船厂，晚上则是游戏和娱乐的聚集地。

聚集地

每天晚上，从日落前一小时到午夜前一小时，@UUID[JournalEntry.mbia2YRWQeDkcOou.JournalEntryPage.jETVN9h0a5MupyxS]{塔米莉·坦德威尔}都会向水手、劳工和旅行者开放镇上主要渔场的一楼，提供一个舒适且热情的场所供大家聚集进行游戏和娱乐。这里为那些想在游戏时享用饮料或零食的人提供一份简单的菜单，塔米莉经常将这些收入以各种即兴游戏锦标赛的竞赛奖金形式回馈给大家。

Involved Terms: Lardus Longsaddle->拉杜斯·长鞍 | adventure->冒险 | Heroes->英雄 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里 | Otari->奥塔里
Original:
A squat, bunker-like stone building that houses Otari’s civic guards.

Who's Who

The Otari Guard keeps the peace in town, and their leader is the gruff and stout Captain @UUID[JournalEntry.mbia2YRWQeDkcOou.JournalEntryPage.AkfhU9sz4aQhw8B6]{Lardus Longsaddle}. Any heroes who get in trouble with the Otari Guard should hope to deal with anyone other than the captain—his curse-laden tirades are legendary, and he’s inclined to issue short jail sentences for minor infractions. Conversely, heroes who catch criminals earn a rare (though often short-lived) position on Captain Longsaddle’s good side, earning bounties from the captain’s pay chest. Fighters might have trained with the Otari Guard or aspired to join their ranks.

Gathering Places

The headquarters of the Otari Guard is a sturdy stone building hung with green-and-white banners that match the guards’ uniforms. These guards keep the peace in town and patrol the surrounding roads to ensure they stay free of banditry and trouble. The guards also serve as the town’s firefighters. Heroes might visit the garrison to hear about bandits or other adventure opportunities—or they might end up in one of the jail cells in the basement if they cause a ruckus in town!
Translation:
一座矮胖、地堡般的石制建筑，里面驻扎着奥塔里的市政卫队。

关键人物

奥塔里卫队负责维持镇上的治安，他们的领袖是粗鲁而壮硕的队长@UUID[JournalEntry.mbia2YRWQeDkcOou.JournalEntryPage.AkfhU9sz4aQhw8B6]{拉杜斯·长鞍}。任何惹上奥塔里卫队的英雄都应该祈祷自己面对的是队长以外的任何人——他那充满咒骂的连篇长篇大论是出了名的，而且他倾向于对轻微的违规行为判处短期监禁。相反，抓获罪犯的英雄会获得队长难得的（虽然通常很短暂）好感，并从队长的薪金箱中获得赏金。战士们可能曾与奥塔里卫队一起训练，或者渴望加入他们的行列。

聚集地

奥塔里卫队的总部是一座坚固的石制建筑，悬挂着与卫兵制服相匹配的绿白相间的旗帜。这些卫兵维持镇上的和平，并巡逻周围的道路，以确保没有土匪和麻烦。卫兵们还兼任镇上的消防员。英雄可能会造访卫戍所，打听有关土匪或其他冒险机会的消息——或者，如果他们在镇上引起骚乱，最终可能会被关进地下室的牢房里！

JSON Path: root.entries.Menace Under Otari.journals.Menace Under Otari.pages.Abadar’s Vault.text
Involved Terms: Abadar's Vault->阿巴达尔的宝库 | spellcaster->施法者 | actions->动作 | kobold->狗头人 | check->检定 | check->检定 | coins->钱币 | coins->钱币 | coins->钱币 | skill->技能 | spell->法术 | spell->法术 | Ezren->艾兹伦 | area->区域 | area->区域 | area->区域 | area->区域 | area->区域 | area->区域 | area->区域 | feat->专长
Original:
The door leading into this chamber is made from stone, making it impossible to break or force open. The only way to open this door is to solve the puzzle in @UUID[.bpVEaN8PUCgbuJvk]{Area 09}. If the players accomplished this feat, the door is open. In that case, read the following aloud.

This small chamber contains an old wooden chest emblazoned with the symbol of a key. Behind the chest is a massive contraption of gears and pulleys that looks like the inner workings of some unseen device.

This chamber holds the blessings of Abadar and the control mechanism for the traps in @UUID[.KWTky7M63NvVIVRz]{Area 11}.

Although the room is dark when the heroes first enter, they can see tiny shafts of light coming from the wall on the north side. Tiny holes in the wall allow them to peek into Area 11. On the far side of this area is a kobold, standing watch. If the heroes listen, they can hear fragments of a quiet conversation between a few other kobolds, out of sight, talking about "the boss's new pet" and plans for "the town above."

Abadar's Blessings

@Actor[8PgsPDw5TjD2dUTr]{Abadar's Vault}

The unlocked chest contains the blessing of Abadar. Inside is a pile of coins, a rolled-up piece of parchment, and a small glass box containing a single emerald. The coins consist of 214 cp, 22 sp, and 3 gp, plus any coins that the heroes lost to the puzzle in Area 9. The heroes can also sell the emerald for 20 gp.

The piece of parchment is a scroll of force barrage. An Arcane or Occult spellcaster (like the iconic wizard, Ezren) can use this scroll to cast the spell force barrage without expending a spell slot or even having it prepared. Once used, the scroll crumbles to dust.

Control Mechanism

If a hero examines the chest, they notice a lever protruding from the back of it. Have them roll a @Check[type:crafting|dc:15]{Crafting Skill Check} check. If the hero succeeds, they realize that this mechanism controls a trap hidden in Area 11, though from here they can’t tell precisely how the trap is triggered or what it does.

The lever is currently set to the “disarmed” position. If the heroes set it to the “active” position, the trap in Area 11 activates.

Experience Points

Sometimes the heroes might earn XP for taking actions to make things easier later on. If the heroes find the lever and set it to activate the trap, give them each 30 XP for their accomplishment.
Translation:
通往这个房间的门是由石头制成的，这使得它无法被打破或强行打开。打开这扇门的唯一方法是解决 @UUID[.bpVEaN8PUCgbuJvk]{区域 09} 中的谜题。如果玩家们完成了这一 专长，门就会打开。在这种情况下，请大声朗读以下内容。

这个小房间里有一个旧木箱，上面印有钥匙的符号。在木箱后面是一个由齿轮和滑轮组成的巨大装置，看起来像是某个看不见的装置的内部构造。

这个房间里有阿巴达尔的祝福，以及 @UUID[.KWTky7M63NvVIVRz]{区域 11} 中陷阱的控制机构。

虽然英雄们第一次进入时房间是黑暗的，但他们可以看到北面墙上射来的微弱光束。墙上的小孔让他们可以窥视 区域 11。在这个 区域 的远端有一个 狗头人 在放哨。如果英雄们倾听，他们可以听到视线之外的其他几个狗头人之间低声交谈的片段，谈论着“老大的新宠物”和“上面的城镇”的计划。

阿巴达尔的祝福

@Actor[8PgsPDw5TjD2dUTr]{阿巴达尔的宝库}

未上锁的箱子里装有阿巴达尔的祝福。里面有一堆 钱币，一卷羊皮纸，以及一个装有一颗祖母绿的小玻璃盒。钱币 包括 214 cp、22 sp 和 3 gp，加上英雄们在 区域 9 的谜题中损失的任何 钱币。英雄们还可以将这颗祖母绿卖出 20 gp。

这卷羊皮纸是一张 力场弹幕卷轴。奥术或异能 施法者（如标志性的法师 艾兹伦）可以使用此卷轴来施放 法术 力场弹幕，而无需消耗 法术 位，甚至无需准备该法术。一旦使用，卷轴就会化为灰烬。

控制机构

如果英雄检查木箱，他们会注意到木箱背面伸出一个杠杆。让他们进行一次 @Check[type:crafting|dc:15]{工艺 技能 检定} 检定。如果英雄成功，他们会意识到这个机构控制着隐藏在 区域 11 中的陷阱，尽管从这里他们无法准确判断陷阱是如何触发的，或者它的作用是什么。

杠杆目前处于“解除”位置。如果英雄们将其拨到“激活”位置，区域 11 中的陷阱就会激活。

经验值

有时，英雄们可能会因为采取 动作 使以后的事情变得更容易而获得经验值。如果英雄们找到了杠杆并将其设置为激活陷阱，请为他们的成就奖励每人 30 XP。

JSON Path: root.entries.Menace Under Otari.journals.Menace Under Otari.pages.The Spider’s Web.text
Involved Terms: difficult terrain->困难地形 | difficult terrain->困难地形 | difficult terrain->困难地形 | character sheet->角色卡 | Healing Potion->治疗药水 | Spider's Lair->蜘蛛巢穴 | basic action->基础动作 | Giant Spider->巨蜘蛛 | Giant Spider->巨蜘蛛 | initiative->先攻 | initiative->先攻 | initiative->先攻 | initiative->先攻 | Perception->察觉 | Perception->察觉 | Perception->察觉 | stat block->数据表 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | character->角色 | character->角色 | character->角色 | character->角色 | dim light->昏暗光照 | encounter->遭遇 | encounter->遭遇 | encounter->遭遇 | creature->生物 | creature->生物 | creature->生物 | movement->移动 | actions->动作 | falling->坠落 | healing->治疗 | success->成功 | terrain->地形 | Effects->效果 | attack->攻击 | attack->攻击 | attack->攻击 | attack->攻击 | attack->攻击 | attack->攻击 | attack->攻击 | damage->伤害 | damage->伤害 | effect->效果 | effect->效果 | effect->效果 | effect->效果 | player->玩家 | senses->感官 | target->目标 | target->目标 | target->目标 | target->目标 | target->目标 | target->目标 | target->目标 | target->目标 | kobold->狗头人 | kobold->狗头人 | armor->护甲 | check->检定 | check->检定 | check->检定 | check->检定 | check->检定 | check->检定 | check->检定 | check->检定 | check->检定 | class->职业 | magic->魔法 | skill->技能 | skill->技能 | skill->技能 | skill->技能 | space->空间 | spell->法术 | area->区域 | area->区域 | area->区域 | area->区域 | area->区域 | item->物品 | item->物品 | item->物品 | rest->休息 | save->豁免 | save->豁免 | save->豁免 | save->豁免 | turn->回合 | turn->回合 | Will->意志 | time->时代 | time->时代 | time->时代 | time->时代 | time->时代
Original:
This room contains thick webs and an enormous spider. The Giant Spider token has already been placed on the scene for you, but like the rats in the previous encounter is hidden from player view. When the heroes enter this area, read the following aloud.

The tunnel continues deeper underground, eventually opening into a large chamber. Patches of glowing blue fungus cling to the ceiling and provide dim light. You can just barely make out vast strands of webbing across the floor and walls of this cavern, stretching between stalactites like shimmering curtains.

This fight uses the same rules as the first fight against the rats, but it also incorporates skill checks when dealing with webs and includes a new kind of @UUID[JournalEntry.OoPjlnYYGLn5KPZy.JournalEntryPage.DyVmklA6nwuY8sgU]{Check}—a saving throw—to resist the spider’s poisonous bite!

This chamber is home to a very big spider, waiting to ambush anything that wanders through its web. The webs aren’t sticky enough to make anyone who touches them unable to move, but they do slow characters down. Each square that has webbing in it is difficult terrain—terrain that’s particularly hard to move through. Moving into a square of difficult terrain costs an extra 5 feet of movement, and a creature can’t Step into a square of difficult terrain. The spider isn’t affected by its webs and can move normally throughout the chamber.

When the players enter the chamber, the spider is in its lair in the northeast corner of the room. It does not emerge to attack until someone touches one of its webs. Anyone trying to cross through the room without touching the webs must attempt an @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:15]{Acrobatics Skill Check} to carefully balance on rocks and narrow ledges. If anyone fails the check, the spider senses them in the room and emerges to attack.

The fight with the spider plays out very much like the combat with the rats. As soon as someone touches one of the webs or fails an Acrobatics check to balance while crossing the room, call for everyone to roll for initiative—usually using Perception, or Stealth for anyone who was hiding at the time. The spider rolls Perception for its initiative.

After you have everyone’s initiative results, start the first round of combat with the character who rolled the highest initiative result. Each character gets to use 3 actions when their turn comes up, and when everyone has had a turn, start over again at the beginning.

The heroes might avoid this fight by carefully moving around the webs. They might also flee from the spider. The spider refuses to leave this area, retreating to its webbed den in the northeast if all the heroes flee.

Spider Fight

@Actor[6NdqvKIlxo4cGhf8]{Giant Spider}

Saving Throws

Whenever the spider manages to successfully attack a character with its fangs, it injects poison as part of the attack. Whenever a character is subjected to poison, they must attempt a special check called a saving throw to resist its effects. There are three types of saving throw: a Fortitude save is typically for resisting poison or disease, a Reflex save is for dodging away from falling debris or avoiding a deadly beam from a spell, and a Will save is usually for resisting spells and magic that befuddle the mind.

Anyone who is bitten by the spider must immediately attempt a Fortitude saving throw by clicking the d20 icon under "Fortitude" in the saves section of their character sheet. If the result is equal to or greater than 16, they resist the poison and suffer no ill effect. If the result is less than 16, the poison takes hold! The details of the poison's effects are included in the spider's stat block.

Ranged Strikes

The giant spider also has a special ranged Strike that lets it throw webbing to trap a nearby creature. Unlike for a melee Strike, the giant spider doesn’t have to be adjacent to a hero to target them with a ranged Strike—it can target a hero anywhere in the room. Otherwise, a ranged Strike works just like a melee Strike. Choose a target by hovering over the token and pressing T, then click the "Strike+ 7" button on the giant spider’s Web Strike, and then compare the total to the Armor Class of the target hero to see if it hits.

While ranged Strikes normally deal damage just like melee Strikes, this web Strike is special. If the attack roll is a success, the target doesn’t take any damage. Instead, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and can’t move out of their square until they successfully use the Escape basic action. You can apply the Immobilized effect by dragging it from this journal directly to the affected token. The target can attempt a check to Escape using the Acrobatics skill or Athletics skill, or a fists attack roll, and the DC is 17. Each attempt to Escape is a single action.

If the total result of the check to Escape is 17 or greater, the target breaks free from the webs and can move freely. You can remove the immobilization effect by right-clicking on the affected token, clicking the "Assign Status Effects" button on the right, and then right-clicking the immobilized effect.  A stuck hero can still attack, cast spells, and otherwise act normally, but they can’t move from their current space on the map.

Experience Points

Sometimes challenges offer multiple ways for the heroes to overcome them. No matter how the heroes overcome a challenge, they earn XP for doing so- but only the first time they overcome it! If the heroes avoid the fight with the spider and you award them XP for doing so, they don't get more XP if they later go back and fight the spider.

The first time the heroes get past the spider, whether by defeating or avoiding it, award them each 40 XP.

Searching the Spider's Lair

@Actor[PziNyZC7L7e9SsGr]{Spider's Lair}

Once the heroes defeat the spider, the players might think to check the spider's lair to see if there is anything of value hidden in the webs. Ask anyone who explores the area to attempt a @Check[type:perception|dc:15]{Perception Check}. If they succeed, they spot a wrapped up bundle of bones and dried skin that looks like it was some sort of small, reptilian creature (in fact, it's a kobold, one of the creatures responsible for breaking into the basement of the fishery).

The bundle also contains a few items of value- a healing potion and a shortsword that has a small emerald in the pommel. While the sword isn't magical, the fine craftsmanship and precious gem make it worth 5 gp if sold.

Loot Actors

The Pathfinder Second Edition system includes compendiums containing every item released by Paizo under the OGL license, which makes handing out loot to players a breeze. To save you even more time, though, we've placed a special type of actor called a "loot actor" on the scene with the items ready for them to pick up. If your players locate the kobold's remains, you can simply reveal the actor on the map, and they'll be able to open its inventory and see (and claim!) the items within.

Several future rooms include loot actors like this one, so keep an eye out for these boxes!

Special Items

One of the items inside the loot sheet- the @Item[LKjaRu3wDgEBpb9C]{Healing Potion}- is a magical consumable. A small number of special items in this adventure may have unique artwork, which you can share with your players by right-clicking on it in the items tab and clicking "view item artwork" followed by "show to players".

If you'd like, you can use the mystification feature to hide the names and descriptions of items that the players have yet to identify. To do this, before you reveal the loot sheet, click on the question mark icon on the corresponding item within its inventory.

Avoiding the Threat

If the heroes are very careful moving around this room, they might avoid the fight with the spider entirely. They might also flee from the spider, moving past the encounter in this area without defeating it. In either case, the spider remains a threat every time the heroes pass through this chamber.

In some adventures, the situation changes if the players take too long or rest too often, but this adventure and its encounter remain the same no matter how long the players take in exploring this dungeon. Any creatures the heroes defeat remain dead or destroyed, and any creatures they avoid remain in the same place—potentially posing a danger if the heroes pass through that area again later!
Translation:
这个房间里结有厚厚的网和一只巨大的蜘蛛。`巨蜘蛛`指示物已帮你放置在场景中了，但就像之前`遭遇`中的老鼠一样，它对`玩家`是隐藏的。当英雄们进入该`区域`时，大声朗读以下内容。

隧道继续向地下深处延伸，最终通向一个大洞穴。发光的蓝色真菌贴在天花板上，提供`昏暗光照`。你们只能勉强辨认出横跨洞穴地面和墙壁的巨大蛛网，它们在钟乳石之间伸展，就像闪闪发光的窗帘。

这场战斗使用与第一次对抗老鼠相同的规则，但它也包含了对付蛛网时的`技能`检定，并包括一种新型的@UUID[JournalEntry.OoPjlnYYGLn5KPZy.JournalEntryPage.DyVmklA6nwuY8sgU]{`检定`}——豁免检定——来抵抗蜘蛛带毒的噬咬！

这个房间是一只非常巨大的蜘蛛的家，它正等待着伏击任何在它的网中游荡的生物。这些蛛网还没有粘到让任何接触到它们的人都无法移动，但它们确实会减慢角色的速度。每一个有蛛网的方格都是`困难地形`——一种特别难以移动穿过的`地形`。移动到一个`困难地形`方格需要花费额外的5尺`移动`，且`生物`不能快步（Step）进入`困难地形`方格。蜘蛛不受其蛛网影响，可以在房间内正常移动。

当玩家进入房间时，蜘蛛就在房间东北角的巢穴里。直到有人触碰到它的蛛网，它才会现身发起`攻击`。任何试图穿越房间而不碰到蛛网的人必须尝试一次@Check[type:acrobatics|dc:15]{Acrobatics `技能` `检定`}，以小心地在岩石和狭窄的岩架上保持平衡。如果有人`检定`失败，蜘蛛就会在房间内`感官`到他们，并现身发起`攻击`。

与蜘蛛的战斗和老鼠的战斗非常相似。只要有人触碰到蛛网，或者在穿越房间进行平衡时特技`检定`失败，就要求所有人投掷`先攻`——通常使用`察觉`，或者对当时正在躲藏的人使用隐秘。蜘蛛使用`察觉`来投掷其`先攻`。

在获得所有人的`先攻`结果后，由`先攻`结果最高的`角色`开始第一轮战斗。每个`角色`在他们的`回合`到来时可以使用3个`动作`，当每个人都进行完一个`回合`后，从头再次开始。

英雄们可以通过小心地绕过蛛网来避免这场战斗。他们也可以从蜘蛛身边逃跑。蜘蛛拒绝离开这个`区域`，如果所有英雄都逃跑了，它会撤回到东北方结网的巢穴中。

蜘蛛战斗 Spider Fight

@Actor[6NdqvKIlxo4cGhf8]{`巨蜘蛛`}

豁免检定 Saving Throws

每当蜘蛛成功用它的毒牙`攻击`一个`角色`时，它会在`攻击`中注入毒素。每当一个`角色`受到毒素影响时，他们必须尝试一种被称为豁免检定的特殊`检定`来抵抗其效果。豁免检定有三种类型：强韧`豁免`通常用于抵抗毒药或疾病，反射`豁免`用于躲避`坠落`的碎片或避开来自`法术`的致命射线，而`意志``豁免`通常用于抵抗迷惑心灵的法术和`魔法`。

任何被蜘蛛咬伤的人必须立即尝试一次强韧豁免检定，方法是点击其`角色卡`豁免部分的“强韧”下的d20图标。如果结果等于或大于16，他们就抵抗了毒素，不会遭受不良`效果`。如果结果小于16，毒素就会发作！毒素效果的细节包含在蜘蛛的`数据表`中。

远程打击 Ranged Strikes

巨蜘蛛还拥有一种特殊的远程打击，让它可以投掷蛛网来困住附近的`生物`。与近战打击不同，巨蜘蛛不需要与英雄相邻就能用远程打击`目标`他们——它可以`目标`房间内任何地方的英雄。除此之外，远程打击的工作方式与近战打击完全相同。通过将鼠标悬停在指示物上并按T来选择一个`目标`，然后点击巨蜘蛛蛛网打击（Web Strike）上的“Strike+ 7”按钮，然后将总值与`目标`英雄的`护甲` `职业`进行比较，看看是否命中。

虽然远程打击通常像近战打击一样造成`伤害`，但这种蛛网打击是特殊的。如果`攻击`投骰`成功`，`目标`不会受到任何`伤害`。相反，`目标`会@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}，并且在成功使用逃脱`基础动作`之前无法移出其方格。你可以通过将禁足`效果`从本日志直接拖到受影响的指示物上来应用它。`目标`可以尝试使用特技`技能`或运动`技能`进行逃脱`检定`，或者使用拳头`攻击`投骰，DC为17。每次尝试逃脱都是一个单动作。

如果逃脱`检定`的总结果为17或更大，`目标`将从蛛网中挣脱并可以自由移动。你可以通过右键点击受影响的指示物，点击右侧的“分配状态`效果`”按钮，然后右键点击禁足`效果`来移除禁足效果。被困住的英雄仍然可以`攻击`、施放法术以及进行其他正常行动，但他们不能从地图上当前的`空间`移动。

经验值 Experience Points

有时挑战会为英雄提供多种克服它们的方法。无论英雄如何克服挑战，他们都会因此获得经验值——但只有在他们第1次克服挑战时才会获得！如果英雄避开了与蜘蛛的战斗，而你因此奖励了他们经验值，那么如果他们后来又回去与蜘蛛战斗，他们就不会获得更多经验值。

英雄们第1次通过蜘蛛挑战时，无论是通过击败还是避开它，奖励他们每人40点经验值。

搜索蜘蛛巢穴 Searching the Spider's Lair

@Actor[PziNyZC7L7e9SsGr]{`蜘蛛巢穴`}

一旦英雄们击败了蜘蛛，玩家可能会想到`检定`蜘蛛的巢穴，看看蛛网中是否藏有任何有价值的东西。让任何探索该`区域`的人尝试一次@Check[type:perception|dc:15]{`察觉` `检定`}。如果他们成功，他们会发现一捆包裹着的骨头和干皮，看起来像是某种小型爬行`生物`（实际上，它是一个`狗头人`，是负责闯入渔场地下室的生物之一）。

这捆东西里还包含一些有价值的物品——一瓶`治疗`药水和一把剑柄上镶嵌着小翡翠的短剑。虽然这把剑不是魔法武器，但精湛的工艺和珍贵的宝石使其价值5金币（gp）。

战利品角色 Loot Actors

开拓者第二版系统包含的典藏库收录了Paizo在OGL许可下发布的每一件`物品`，这使得向玩家分发战利品变得轻而易举。不过，为了帮你`豁免`更多`时代`，我们在场景中放置了一种名为“战利品角色”的特殊类型角色，其中的物品已准备好供他们拾取。如果你的玩家找到了`狗头人`的遗骸，你只需在地图上显示该角色，他们就能打开其物品栏并查看（并领取！）其中的物品。

未来的几个房间也包含像这样的战利品角色，所以请留意这些箱子！

特殊物品 Special Items

战利品表中的其中一件物品——@Item[LKjaRu3wDgEBpb9C]{`治疗药水`}——是一种魔法消耗品。本`冒险`中的少数特殊物品可能拥有独特的艺术图，你可以通过在物品标签页中右键点击它，然后点击“查看`物品`艺术图”，接着点击“展示给玩家”来与你的玩家分享。

如果你愿意，你可以使用神秘化功能来隐藏玩家尚未鉴定的物品名称和描述。为此，在你展示战利品表之前，点击其物品栏中相应`物品`上的问号图标。

避开威胁 Avoiding the Threat

如果英雄们在这个房间里移动时非常小心，他们可能会完全避开与蜘蛛的战斗。他们也可能从蜘蛛身边逃跑，在不击败它的情况下通过该`区域`的`遭遇`。在任何一种情况下，每当英雄们穿过这个洞穴时，蜘蛛仍然是一个威胁。

在某些冒险中，如果玩家花费太长时间或`休息`太频繁，情况会发生变化，但无论玩家在探索这个地下城时花费多长时间，本`冒险`及其`遭遇`都保持不变。英雄们击败的任何生物都保持死亡或被摧毁状态，而他们避开的任何生物都留在原地——如果英雄们稍后再次经过该`区域`，可能会构成危险！

Involved Terms: Pregenerated Heroes->预设英雄 | Pathfinder Society->开拓者协会 | Pathfinder Society->开拓者协会 | character creation->创建角色 | Setting the Scene->设置场景 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | adventure->冒险 | character->角色 | encounter->遭遇 | setting->设定 | player->玩家 | level->等级 | Otari->奥塔里 | time->时代 | time->时代
Original:
The First Adventure

"Menace under Otari" is designed to teach new Game Masters and players how to play Pathfinder. Each section of the adventure will teach new concepts as you need them, adding more and more to the game. Meanwhile, the other players each have an entire hero to roleplay as, learning how to use their abilities and how to succeed in the dangerous world that they find themselves exploring.

If you're the Game Master and you want to play with your friends right now, start with this adventure. It walks you and the other players through how to play, giving you a chance to learn together. If you don't want to play right away, the journal is a great starting place to learn more about being a GM.

Choosing a Hero

This adventure is designed to be played by four 1st-level heroes, but it will work for two or three heroes with only a few slight adjustments. Each player should pick one of the @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.FM2SxBvhjufkiW44]{Pregenerated Heroes}, or build their own hero following the steps in the @UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.RRxNZiD64dvvpWYt]{Character Creation} handout.

If you are planning on running the game for Pathfinder Society organised play, you should also ensure that you have verified the information within the @UUID[.WpWULbveo4SMmMj5]{Pathfinder Society} handout.

Give the players 10-15 minutes to look over their character sheets so they can learn how their characters work. During this time, you should read through the introduction and @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{first encounter} to get ready to run it. If you have extra time, you might also want to read the @UUID[JournalEntry.S1UnJk4t55aRFaCs.JournalEntryPage.ZFjG6Np42VRz5hFu]{Encounters} rules in preparation.

Getting Started

When your players have chosen their heroes, you're ready to move on to the next step- setting up the adventure! The @UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.QFVMina0vPQXKUxC]{Setting the Scene} page has all the information you need to share before your players dive into the dungeon proper.
Translation:
第一场冒险

“奥塔里地底的威胁”旨在教导新的地下城主和玩家如何游玩寻路者（Pathfinder）。冒险的每个章节都会在需要时教导新的概念，为游戏不断增添内容。与此同时，其他玩家每人都有一个完整的英雄角色来进行角色扮演，学习如何使用他们的能力，以及如何在这个他们正在探索的危险世界中取得成功。

如果你是地下城主，并且想现在就和朋友们一起玩，那就从这场冒险开始吧。它会引导你和其他玩家了解如何游玩，给你们一个共同学习的机会。如果你不想马上开始玩，这本日志也是学习更多关于担任GM知识的绝佳起点。

选择英雄

这场冒险是为四名1等级英雄设计的，但只需进行少量微调，也适用于两名或三名英雄。每位玩家应该从@UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.FM2SxBvhjufkiW44]{预设英雄}中选择一个，或者按照@UUID[JournalEntry.KIpNnMtah73eyPC8.JournalEntryPage.RRxNZiD64dvvpWYt]{创建角色}讲义中的步骤创建自己的英雄。

如果你计划为开拓者协会组织化游玩运行游戏，你还应确保已核实@UUID[.WpWULbveo4SMmMj5]{开拓者协会}讲义中的信息。

给玩家10-15分钟时间查看他们的角色卡，以便他们了解自己的角色是如何运作的。在此时代，你应该通读简介和@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.UEuiUcrrPdr9eFqN]{第一场遭遇}，为运行游戏做好准备。如果你有额外的时代，你可能还想阅读@UUID[JournalEntry.S1UnJk4t55aRFaCs.JournalEntryPage.ZFjG6Np42VRz5hFu]{遭遇}规则以作准备。

开始游玩

当你的玩家选好英雄后，你就可以进行下一步——设定这场冒险了！@UUID[JournalEntry.qFSLpCM2cpRQWCR2.JournalEntryPage.QFVMina0vPQXKUxC]{设置场景}页面包含了在玩家深入地城之前你需要分享的所有信息。

Involved Terms: adventuring gear->冒险道具 | Wrin Sivinxi->瓦林·希温尼斯 | ammunition->弹药 | adventure->冒险 | magic->魔法 | magic->魔法 | magic->魔法 | magic->魔法
Original:
A peculiar curio shop run by an eccentric woman who collects rumors.

Goods and Services

This odd, domed building is always open. The proprietor, @UUID[JournalEntry.mbia2YRWQeDkcOou.JournalEntryPage.U8WO4NCJKke3RmEf]{Wrin Sivinxi}, sells adventuring gear, consumable magic items (except ammunition), held magic items, magic wands, and worn magic items. Wrin is a bit unusual, seeing menace in every corner and truths in the constellations above, but she’s eager to get to know adventurers and show off the many magical trinkets in her collection. She also gathers rumors and therefore makes a good contact for a group of heroes looking for their next adventure!
Translation:
一家由一位收集传闻的古怪女性经营的奇特古玩店。

商品与服务

这座古怪的圆顶建筑总是敞开大门。店主 @UUID[JournalEntry.mbia2YRWQeDkcOou.JournalEntryPage.U8WO4NCJKke3RmEf]{瓦林·希温尼斯} 出售 冒险道具、消耗性 魔法 物品（弹药 除外）、手持 魔法 物品、魔法 魔杖以及穿戴式 魔法 物品。瓦林有点不同寻常，她在每个角落都能看到威胁，并从上方的星辰中窥见真理，但她渴望结识冒险者，并展示她收藏的许多魔法小玩意。她还收集传闻，因此对于寻找下一次 冒险 的英雄团队来说，她是一个很好的联络人！
